snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include the Internet trail left by the student accused in a bomb hoax at Harvard. Plus, hackers get courted by the government to fight the next generation cyberwarfare.
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the web include the Internet trail left by the student accused in a bomb hoax at Harvard. Plus, hackers get courted by the government to fight the next generation cyberwarfare.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: How Alleged Harvard Hoaxer Didn't Cover Digital Tracks, and Hackers on Front Lines
